mapper.select: SELECT company_name FROM tb_merchant WHERE id= #{id}
SELECT m.company_name, ci.credit_code, ci.address_and_telephone, ci.bank_and_account FROM tb_merchant AS m LEFT JOIN tb_company_info AS ci ON m.company_id = ci.id WHERE m.id=#{id}

SELECT payment_order_id, company_id, merchant_name, tax_name, package_status, real_money, is_invoice, payment_date FROM ( SELECT b.id AS payment_order_id, b.company_id AS company_id, b.company_s_name AS merchant_name, b.platform_service_provider AS tax_name, b.tax_id AS tax_id, ( CASE WHEN isnull(b.id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS package_status, b.real_money AS real_money, b.is_invoice AS is_invoice, b.payment_date AS payment_date FROM ( tb_payment_order b LEFT JOIN tb_merchant a ON ( (a.company_id = b.company_id) ) ) UNION SELECT b.id AS payment_order_id, b.company_id AS company_id, b.company_s_name AS merchant_name, b.platform_service_provider AS tax_name, b.tax_id AS tax_id, ( CASE WHEN isnull(b.id) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) AS package_status, b.real_money AS real_money, b.is_application AS is_invoice, b.payment_date AS payment_date FROM ( tb_payment_order_many b LEFT JOIN tb_merchant a ON ( (a.company_id = b.company_id) ) ) ) AS tmp where tmp.company_id = #{merchantId} and tmp.tax_id = #{taxId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.id AS company_id, t1.id as tax_id , t4.id as merchant_id, t1.tax_name, t3.company_name, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(real_money) from tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=6),0) as total_package_money, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(real_money) from tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=3),0) as many_package_money, (SELECT COUNT(id) from tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=6) as total_package_count, (SELECT COUNT(id) from tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=3) as many_package_count, 1 as cooperation_state, (SELECT create_date from tb_company_tax WHERE company_id=t3.id AND tax_id=t1.id GROUP BY company_id) as start_cooperation_date, if(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1), 'MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss') > DATE_FORMAT((SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1), 'MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss'),(SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1),(SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1)) as lately_cooperation_date FROM tb_tax t1 INNER JOIN tb_company_tax t2 on t2.tax_id = t1.id INNER JOIN tb_company_info t3 on t3.id = t2.company_id INNER JOIN tb_merchant t4 on t3.id = t4.company_id and t4.parent_id =0 where t3.id = #{param1}
